title: Mecha zero sion ult
body:
It might just be me but whenever i ult as Mecha zero sion i find it almost impossible to turn rather then one of his old skins or his base skin it feels really clunky and like it doesn't want to turn in any direction no matter how acutely i place my cursor to the left or right I love this skin but its hard to take it into ranked games considering its such a huge limiter on my ult I dont know if this an actual bug or not but its worth looking into.
 Im curious if anyone else has this problem?

Thanks for reading!

replies.body:
Hey Digitus - 

I just loaded up Mecha Zero Sion and base Sion in game, and I haven't noticed difference between controlling the skin versus the base. Have you noticed this under ant specific circumstances, or just in general?

It Normally occurs when ulting long distances for me when I travel down a lane i find sions responsiveness shrinking to the point where i cannot turn at all although it might just be my perception of it because of the new model just feels less smooth or responsive Thank you for looking into it!
Of course! New models and sounds can throw people off. Do you think it's possible that the vibrating animation of the train may be throwing you off a bit?
I had no idea it vibrated but I just played him with base and compared the two and i think that's the Ticket #punsofdmg thank you for your help i greatly appreciate it :D have a great day
Ahhh, okay I'm so glad that seems to be the case. Happy to help! ^-^ Take care!
